name: ScrumMaster
0:
”Alexa ask Scrum Master to start the scrum”
”Alexa ask Scrum Master to end Scrum”
”Alexa ask Scrum Master for the time”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scrum master
des: Scrum Master helps you effectively run a scrum meeting and get updates from your team! Start and stop your scrum and hear how long it took. Get faster and more efficient over time!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
